ygData.subject: RE: Re: Bards vs. casters, melee, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: i have heard lots of different things.  i believe from a test done on this list, it shows that the haste sash definitely stacks with our songs.  the delay
ygData.messageBody:
i have heard lots of different things. i believe from a test done on this
list, it shows that the haste sash definitely stacks with our songs. the
delay reduction on the sash is i believe 20-25% give or take. i am pretty
sure the sash effect, since not a spell, will stack with anything. what i
have heard different things about is whether our songs will stack with
enchanter's speedup spells. i have been told yes and no. seeing as the
enchanter spells are a "foot" icon and our songs are a "fist" icon i
believed they do stack. would love to know for sure.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server



> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > Now there's a good question. What happens when someone with
> > haste effects active gets hit by slowdowns?
>
> Does the haste sash stack with any of our songs?
> What is the delay reduction on the sash, as well?
>
> Harmonic.
